checkboxSearch(item){    
            if(this.checkSearch.indexOf(item.tableNo)>-1){                    
                this.searchRules = this.searchRules + ',' +item.tableNo;                                          
            }else{                
                //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å–æ¶ˆ                
                this.searchRules = this.searchRules.indexOf(",")==0 ? this.searchRules.replace(','+item.tableNo,'') : this.searchRules.replace(item.tableNo,'')                                                       
            }                 
            //ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å¦æ˜¯","                       
            this.searchKeys = this.searchRules.indexOf(",")==0 ? this.searchRules.substr(1) : this.searchRules.substr(0)                 
        },
